emerging_markets.title: Trump's tariffs on Brazil could make your coffee even more expensive
emerging_markets.snippet: President Donald Trump plans to impose a 50% tariff on Brazilian imports, which will hit coffee drinkers. The U.S. imports most of its coffee from Brazil.

emerging_markets.title: International And Emerging Markets Starting To Percolate: 10- And 15-Year Annual Returns Still Modest
emerging_markets.snippet: International equities (and even bonds, for that matter) have had a good 2025 so far this year. Emerging markets are possibly starting to show some forward progress.

emerging_markets.title: Exclusive: Indonesia plans $8 bln refineries contract with US firm amid tariffs deal, sources say
emerging_markets.snippet: Indonesian sovereign wealth fund Danantara plans to sign an $8 billion engineering, procurement and construction contract with U.S. engineering firm KBR Inc to build 17 modular ref…
